text: in a prison designed to hold the worst
of the worst you might think they had
the worst food but guess what
Alcatraz had by far the best food in the
federal prison system this is the
Alcatraz prison and mess hall where all
the prisoners ate fact the guards ate
the same food as the prisoners exactly
the same food so it was good I know
several reasons for that the warden said
that most trouble in prison is caused by
bad food
therefore I'm feeding them good
today bill can go back into the kitchen
where he wasn't allowed as an inmate
because he never had a job there the
windows were a little cleaner in our day
this place was spotless back in those
days you can shine concrete actually and
we we had siding we had some breaded
pork chops I remember those with pork
chop gravy you know how you use the
grease to make the gravy and forward
over biscuits and stuff like that man
that was good
